import React,{useState} from "react" const FormComponent=()=>{ const[enteredName, setEnteredName]=useState('') const[enteredAge, setEnteredAge]=useState(0) const onChangeNameHandler=(event)=>{ setEnteredName(event.target.value) console.log(event.target.value) } const onChangeAgeHandler=(event)=>{ setEnteredAge(event.target.value.toString()) console.log(event.target.value) } const onSubmitHandler=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() setEnteredName('') setEnteredAge(0) } return (
) } export default FormComponent
